message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I get $6,000 and you get $4,000.  It's important to reach a deal quickly because the value decreases over time.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the value will decrease faster for you than for me. Let's work together to get the most out of this deal.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with time, just like yours will.  Let's settle this now.  I'll take a slight hit with $5,500 and you get $4,500.
